member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.IpClient.AllocateCustomerCredit(TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.AllocateCustomerCreditRequest)
member.summary: This API is used for a partner to set credit for a customer, such as increasing or lowering the credit and setting it to 0. 1. The credit is valid permanently and will not be zeroed regularly. 2. The customer's service will be suspended when its available credit sets to 0, so caution should be exercised with this operation. 3. To prevent the customer from making new purchases without affecting their use of previously purchased products, the partner can set their available credit to 0 after obtaining the non-stop feature privilege from the channel manager. 4. The set credit is an increase to the current available credit and cannot exceed the remaining allocable credit. Setting the credit to a negative value indicates to repossess it. The available credit can be set to 0 at the minimum.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.IpClient.AllocateCustomerCreditSync(TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.AllocateCustomerCreditRequest)
member.summary: This API is used for a partner to set credit for a customer, such as increasing or lowering the credit and setting it to 0. 1. The credit is valid permanently and will not be zeroed regularly. 2. The customer's service will be suspended when its available credit sets to 0, so caution should be exercised with this operation. 3. To prevent the customer from making new purchases without affecting their use of previously purchased products, the partner can set their available credit to 0 after obtaining the non-stop feature privilege from the channel manager. 4. The set credit is an increase to the current available credit and cannot exceed the remaining allocable credit. Setting the credit to a negative value indicates to repossess it. The available credit can be set to 0 at the minimum.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.AccountType
member.summary: Account type of a new customer. Valid values: `personal`, `company`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.Mail
member.summary: Registered email address, which should be valid and correct. For example, account@qq.com.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.ConfirmPassword
member.summary: Confirm the password. It must be the same as the `Password` field.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.PhoneNum
member.summary: Customer mobile number, which should be valid and correct. A global mobile number within 1-32 digits is allowed, such as 18888888888.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.CountryCode
member.summary: Customer’s country/region code, which can be obtained via the `GetCountryCodes` API, such as “852”.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.Area
member.summary: Customer’s ISO2 standard country/region code, which can be obtained via the `GetCountryCodes` API. It should correspond to the `CountryCode` field, such as `HK`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ip.V20210409.Models.CreateAccountRequest.Extended
member.summary: Expanded field, which is left empty by default.
